nodes.description: 巴基斯坦拉合尔市Gulshan-e-Iqbal公园停车场发生自杀式爆炸，袭击者携带装满钢珠的爆炸背心
nodes.support_text: A suicide bomber set off an explosive vest packed with ball bearings in a parking lot just feet away from amusement park rides in Gulshan-e-Iqbal Park...

nodes.description: 爆炸造成70人死亡、300余人受伤，多数为妇女儿童，现场邻近游乐园设施
nodes.support_text: killing at least 70 people and wounding more than 300 others, most of them women and children...

nodes.description: 极端组织Jamaat-ul-Ahrar（巴基斯坦塔利班分支）宣称对爆炸负责，称针对基督徒庆祝复活节
nodes.support_text: A splinter group of the Pakistani Taliban claimed responsibility for the blast, which it said was aimed at Christians celebrating the Easter holiday...

nodes.description: 拉合尔医院因伤员涌入陷入混乱，救护车资源不足导致伤者转乘出租车和机动三轮车
nodes.support_text: Victims jammed Lahore’s hospitals, spilling into the corridors where doctors and medical staff raced to treat them. Many more victims arrived at medical facilities in taxis or motorized rickshaws...

nodes.description: 巴军方封锁现场，电视画面显示血腥画面和警察护送悲痛家长离开
nodes.support_text: Pakistani soldiers cordoned off the area as television images showed bloodied bodies being covered in bags and distraught parents being led from the park by police officers...

nodes.description: 巴首席部长宣布进入三天官方哀悼期，军方谴责袭击为‘野蛮行为’
nodes.support_text: The chief minister of Punjab state announced three days of official mourning. Pakistani security officials condemned the 'savage' attack...

nodes.description: 该袭击成为2014年巴军营学校屠杀事件（143人死亡）后最严重平民袭击
nodes.support_text: It was deadliest attack in Pakistan since the December 2014 massacre at an army-run school that left 143 people dead...

nodes.description: Jamaat-ul-Ahrar在2014年脱离原塔利班联盟，2014年曾在拉合尔边境地区发动60人死亡袭击
nodes.support_text: The group that claimed responsibility for Sunday’s blast, the Jamaat-ul-Ahrar faction of the Pakistani Taliban, split with the federation in 2014 and is believed to have carried out a major attack in Lahore later that year...

nodes.description: 2017年该组织在佩夏瓦大学发动袭击，造成21名学生死亡
nodes.support_text: In January, a separate splinter faction of the Pakistani Taliban claimed responsibility for a raid on a university in the northeastern town of Peshawar that killed 21...

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦基督徒占比不足2%，2013年曾遭教堂自杀式爆炸袭击（75人死亡）
nodes.support_text: Christians, who make up less than 2% of Pakistan’s 182 million people, have frequently been targeted by Pakistani extremist groups. In 2013, 75 Christians were killed in a suicide bombing at a church...

nodes.description: 白宫谴责袭击并致哀，强调公园长期作为城市宁静象征
nodes.support_text: The White House, in a statement, condemned the attack on 'what has long been a scenic and placid park.'

nodes.description: 巴国内自2003年以来已有超过21000名平民死于武装冲突
nodes.support_text: Since 2003, more than 21,000 Pakistani civilians have been killed in militant violence...

nodes.description: massacre事件标志着巴基斯坦新的暴力转折点
nodes.support_text: massacre event marks Pakistan's new violent turning point

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦塔利班持续发动袭击
nodes.support_text: Pakistani Taliban continues to launch attacks

nodes.description: 巴基斯坦塔利班发动大胆袭击

nodes.support_text: Jamaat-ul-Ahrar claims responsibility for Sunday's blast

nodes.description: 分裂派别声称对大学袭击负责
